{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 | 
scoped_allocator_adaptor select_on_container_copy_construction() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Creates a new instance of {{tt|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor}}, where the outer allocator base class and each inner allocator subobject are obtained by calling {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;A&gt;::select_on_container_copy_construction()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A new {{tt|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor}} object, constructed from correctly copied allocators.
